channel.title: eQS on Kyle Kumbier
channel.description: Recent content in eQS on Kyle Kumbier

item.title: Enhancing The Quality Start
item.description: First Pitch I’d like to start off by asking a trivia question: Who pitched better in 2015? Shelby Miller or Drew Hutchison? Here’s a hint. Their records were 6-17 and 13-5, respectively. I’m guessing that with this information you would be comfortable answering Drew Hutchison. Here’s another hint. Their ERAs were 3.02 and 5.57, respectively. Yes, respectively. Same order. I’m guessing now you may be reconsidering. Here’s my point. The notion that wins are sufficient to measure starting pitcher performance would be absurd in today’s game.
